name: The Carrot Slayer - Gruesome Version
description:
The Carrot Slayer

The First 100% Vegetarian Toy

The Carrot Slayer is Very Bravo's tribute to the vegetarian movement: a funny executioner that, being against the murdering of people and animals, decided to put himself to the test in the art of cookery, cutting and chopping vegetables with his axe. On his belly, a cheap tattoo with the writing "Veg Life" and, chaperoning and smiling at him, a little freshly chopped carrot, bursting with irony and good humor.

The Carrot Slayer, the very first vegetarian toy, is 8 inches/20 cm tall and comes in two limited editions of 250 pcs each: Gruesome, that wears leather and brings to mind a fetish atmosphere, and Hippie, dressed in exuberant colours, like a nostalgic flower child.

name: The Ghetto Reaper - Silver Shiver
description:
The Ghetto Reaper

The Original Very Bravo Mascot

Very Bravo's first toy is the brand's mascot, a funny Death making the OK gesture and a mocking sneer. The Ghetto Reaper flirts with the hip-hop culture in an ironic and funny way, starting from its name, the golden tooth and the large bling jewelry with the RIP symbol around his neck.

The Ghetto Reaper is 8 inches/20 cm tall and comes in two limited editions of 250 pcs each: Gold & Cold, dressed in black with a golden necklace and Silver Shiver, purple with the silver bling.
